entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho's head is on Hermione's shoulder, indicating that Cho is present in the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as a small silver-haired girl who is ghostly green and pale, indicating her condition.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is struggling to fight off the mermen and looking around for other champions.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is swimming towards Harry with an enormous bubble around his head, indicating he has arrived at the scene.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as one of the champions who will be arriving soon.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as another champion who will be arriving soon.

relationships.description: Harry expresses concern for Hermione's safety, indicating a relationship between the two characters.
Cedric is swimming towards Harry to be rescued, indicating a relationship between the two characters.
Fleur and Krum are mentioned as arriving soon, indicating a relationship between them and Harry.
Krum is mentioned as arriving soon, indicating a relationship between him and Harry.
